text: Joseph Anthony Pereira (born September 10, 1950) is an American guitarist and singer-songwriter. He is known as a member of the American rock band Aerosmith. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Aerosmith members Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American rock singers Category:American rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Massachusetts Category:People from Lawrence, Massachusetts Category:Singers from Massachusetts
title: Joe Perry (musician)
